name: Pawsmic Pressure
description:
Pawsmic Pressure is an exciting and unique puzzle game set in a recently damaged and evacuated space station. The Pawtagonist, a genetically modified astronaut cat with a space suit full of tricks, must navigate through different chambers in the space station to make it to the last escape pod and fly back to Earth. They must solve puzzles involving manipulating air pressure to bypass air locks and other obstacles along their journey.

Pawsmic Pressure was made in 48 hours for Texas Game Jam 2022.

Programmer: Weston Wright

https://westonwright.itch.io/

Designer: Brandon Pruitt

https://itch.io/profile/branp8025

Artist: Aurelia Vick

https://bubblesweet.artstation.com/
